name: Instacart for EBT/SNAP
description: 50% off Instacart+ membership for one year; skip delivery/pickup fees with participating stores; new customers get $0 delivery on first 3 orders
fullDescription: Instacart is a grocery delivery and pickup service. They offer special discounts for EBT/SNAP recipients, making grocery delivery more accessible and affordable.
whatTheyOffer:
- 50% off Instacart+ membership for one year
- Skip delivery and pickup fees at participating stores
- New customers get $0 delivery on first 3 orders
- Use EBT/SNAP benefits for eligible food items
howToGetIt:
1. Download the Instacart app or visit instacart.com
2. Create an account
3. Add your EBT card to your payment methods
4. Apply for the discounted Instacart+ membership
5. Start shopping with reduced fees
keywords: Instacart, EBT, SNAP, grocery delivery, food stamps, Instacart+, food delivery, low-income, free delivery, pickup
